title: How do i apply for staff?

replies.body: Normally, you'd have to apply for staff once they open. As of now, they aren't. Maybe you should try once they do open up. :D
replies.body_tagged: Normally, you'd have to apply for staff once they open. As of now, they aren't. Maybe you should try once they do open up. :D

replies.body: You are going to have to wait until Staff Applications open again. Rumor has it that they will be back up in June and that is when you will be able to apply again.
replies.body_tagged: You are going to have to wait until Staff Applications open again. Rumor has it that they will be back up in June and that is when you will be able to apply again.
